name: Bib adventures
description:
This is Bib.

He woke up in a distant future on our dear planet. He finds out it's not really as he remembers... But that's fine, he'll make do, he says.

Let's find out what's in the water in the lake and fish it ! Bib needs some carrots to lure it, he can grow carrots by defeating monsters in the forest up north. Be careful of the toxic waste around ! And good luck on the way.

Use Enter and backspace in the mainmenu and Use keyboard arrows to play once started !

_____________________________________________________________________

Hi ! This is a WIP of a little project I had in mind. I'm using the free version of old Construct 2 (can't find the full C2 now that C3 is up... :( ) so unfortunately it's a really tiny project, I can't go much farther than what I already coded in cuz of the limitations. Still, I had a blast doing this and it enables me to use all the game assets I designed for this game !

Inspired by solarpunk & nature, wanted to design things with theses themes.

There's some inconsistencies and such in the gameplay and designs but eh I'm not a game designer, i'm an illustrator, i'm simply learning~
